trans-unit.source: To add additional address space, click **All settings** to open the **Settings** blade.
trans-unit.target: To add additional address space, click **All settings** to open the **Settings** blade.

trans-unit.source: On the **Settings** blade, click **Address space** to open the Address space blade.
trans-unit.target: On the **Settings** blade, click **Address space** to open the Address space blade.

trans-unit.source: Add the additional address space in this blade, and then click **Save** at the top of the blade.
trans-unit.target: Add the additional address space in this blade, and then click **Save** at the top of the blade.

trans-unit.source: To add additional subnets to your address spaces, in the **Settings** blade, click **Subnets** to open the **Subnets** blade.
trans-unit.target: To add additional subnets to your address spaces, in the **Settings** blade, click **Subnets** to open the **Subnets** blade.

trans-unit.source: In the Subnets blade, click **Add** to open the **Add subnet** blade.
trans-unit.target: In the Subnets blade, click **Add** to open the **Add subnet** blade.

trans-unit.source: Name your new subnet and specify the address range, and then click **OK** at the bottom of the blade.
trans-unit.target: Name your new subnet and specify the address range, and then click **OK** at the bottom of the blade.

trans-unit.source: Once a subnet has been created, you can use the subnets blade to view all of your subnets for a VNet.
trans-unit.target: Once a subnet has been created, you can use the subnets blade to view all of your subnets for a VNet.
